#p1032001# says that he has heard a rumor about a #bDragon mount#k and is curious whether an Onyx Dragon can be mounted. If it seems possible after talking to #b#p1013000##k, return to #p1032001#.\r\n\r\n#y22401# #b(#u22401#)#k
#p1032001# says that he heard about a very powerful warrior named #p9901000# who knows how to mount a dragon and suggests that you go to #m102000000# and meet with #p9901000#.
How is your research on Onyx Dragons going? I recently heard an interesting rumor about a #bDragon mount#k. Someone was seen in Victoria Island riding a Dragon.
Amazing, right? Dragons are known to be haughty and prideful, but I guess they let humans they are close to ride them. I wonder if the same applies to Onyx Dragons.
But we can't study Onyx Dragons, since they became extinct a long time ago... I wish there were #bsomeone we could talk to who'd know about whether Onyx Dragons can be used as mounts#k.
I thought I'd tell you about it, since you're researching Onyx Dragons. If you ever find out whether Onyx Dragons can be mounted, do come back to #b#m101000000##k and let me know.
Hmm... I guess your research hasn't reached that level yet.

Oh, it's you... How is your study of Onyx Dragons going? Did you ever find out if Onyx Dragons can be mounted. \r\n#L0##bI think it is possible, but I'm not sure how. I should ask the person who is rumored to have ridden a Dragon.#l\n#k

Hm. I guess the person I mentioned before who was riding a Dragon wasn't riding an Onyx Dragon. Still, maybe you'd learn how to mount an Onyx Dragon if you talk to him about how he mounts his own Dragon.

If you are really interested, you should visit #m102000000#. #b#p9901000##k is said to be at the #b#m102000000 Warrior's Sanctuary#. You should be able to find out more about mounting Dragons from him. He is supposed to be very powerful...
I guess if an Onyx Dragon had a close enough relationship with a human, then the Dragon would let that human mount him. This will take some more studying...
It would be nice if we could just ask an Onyx Dragon about this...
